metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17915 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20171217 Q8, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in ReadMNGImage in coders/png.c, related to accessing one byte before testing whether a limit has been reached. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
